narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 7-year-old female was last seen at Alexandria at 2025-09-28T01:06:25.816824+00:00. The child was reported missing by friend after failing to arrive at school.
behavioral_patterns: left on foot toward nearby woods
entered vehicle and headed northbound on I-95

narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 12 hours of disappearance, movement cues turned onto US-58 east toward Suffolk suggest travel northbound along VA-168. A white 2019 Ford F-150 was observed departing near Alexandria, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 24 hours later, a passerby reported someone matching the description (7-year-old female, wearing red hoodie, blue jeans, white sneakers) near Portsmouth.
witness_accounts.clothing: red hoodie, blue jeans, white sneakers

provenance._fulltext: A 7-year-old female was last seen at Alexandria at 2025-09-28T01:06:25.816824+00:00. The child was reported missing by friend after failing to arrive at school. Within 12 hours of disappearance, movement cues turned onto US-58 east toward Suffolk suggest travel northbound along VA-168. A white 2019 Ford F-150 was observed departing near Alexandria, Virginia. Around 24 hours later, a passerby reported someone matching the description (7-year-old female, wearing red hoodie, blue jeans, white sneakers) near Portsmouth.
